import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import { classNames } from '../../helper/ultility' const Dropdown = props => { const { item, subItems, styles } = props return (
{item.name}
{ subItems.map((sub) => (
{({ active }) => ( {sub.name} )}
))} ) } export default Dropdown;
